experiencia.descripcion: SMX student at IES Sant Vicent Ferrer in Algemesí.
Repair of equipment (computers, printers, etc.) and network technician.
DAM student at IES Sant Vicent Ferrer in Algemesí.
I helped develop a cash management application (ImaCash). During this period, I learned to work with C# and .NET 4, SQL Server, and version control using Git with Gitea.
